p: COVID-19 pandemic is spreading around the world with unprecedented speed. In this situation, it is important to analyze the available data to provide guidelines. From the studies we have reviewed above, it is clear that the chest CT has a high sensitivity to detect COVID-19. It seems, however, that while the identification of the virus RNA is the unanimous proof of the disease, the RT-PCR approach is not able to detect all the infections especially in the early phase of the disease. Even more, some studies suggest that chest CT might be more sensitive in this phase.
